name: Inplace
description: Inplace provides an easy to do editing and display at the same time where clicking the output displays the actual content.

active.label: active
active.title: Whether the content is displayed or not.

closable.label: closable
closable.title: Displays a button to switch back to display mode.

diabled.label: diabled
diabled.title: When present, it specifies that the element should be disabled.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

events.name: open
events.title: Callback to invoke when inplace is opened.

events.name: close
events.title: Callback to invoke when inplace is closed.
